vulnerability.name: USN-4014-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4014-1 fixed a vulnerability in GLib. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that GLib incorrectly handled certain files.  An attacker could possibly use this issue to access sensitive information.

statements.status_notes: GLib could be made to expose sensitive information if it received a specially crafted file. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
